nodes.text: A salvage yard was a facility where obsolete or decommissioned spacecraft, ranging from starfighters to capital ships, were dismantled for scrap or destroyed after being salvaged for valuable components. Reklam Station, an Imperial salvage yard orbiting within the atmosphere of the planet Yarma, was used to destroy old Republic Y-wings whose hyperdrives had been salvaged. Some shipyards, such as the one at Kartoosh, served also as salvage yards.
